description: This course introduces differential and integral calculus of functions of a single real variable, including trigonometric, exponential, and logarithmic functions. Derivatives and integrals are explored graphically, symbolically, and numerically. Applications of the derivative are included. Prerequisite: mathematics placement recommendation. Offered each semester.
name: Calculus I
prerequisites: mathematics placement recommendation. Offered each semester.

revisions.prerequisites: Prerequisite: mathematics placement recommendation. Offered each semester.
